trigger.tip5: The note will be sent to recipients when your master time up

trigger.tipAddTrigger1: You didn't add the send condition trigger, the note will not be sent. Please add a trigger to send
trigger.tipTrigger1: Set a condition to trigger the note to recipient

task.title: Title
task.tipDelete2: The task cannot be recovered after you delete it!
task.tip1: Important and urgent, do it now!
task.tip2: Important but not urgent, do it whenever you have time
task.tip3: Urgent but not important, let other people to handle
task.tip4: Don't waste your time on it

creativeNote.titleHolder: Please input createive note title here
creativeNote.tipTitle1: Review the best things, and write it down here, summon the positive energy to start a new day
creativeNote.tipTitle2: By writing out your thoughts or feelings, you can visualize what's going on in your head. Write down your thoughts to achieve a dialogue with yourself, so that you can calmly and objectively analyze your mood, thoughts and actions.
creativeNote.tipTitle3: What is the most important thing in your life and what specific things do you currently need to do to make it happen
creativeNote.tipDelete1: Are you sure to delete this creative note?
creativeNote.tipDelete2: The note cannot be recovered after deleted!
creativeNote.tipCreativeNote: Createive notes allow you to keep abreast of your work and life situations, fight off procrastination, and adjust your state to do what you really want to do.

dashboard.tip3: After the timer up, your message will be sent out
dashboard.tip4: Click Snooze, you can reset the timer

myProfile.tip1: Bind an email, if this email already exist, switch to this email account
myProfile.tipNoEmail: You have not bind your email, for your data safety, please bind one.

noteSend.tipNoEmail: You must specify the receiver email
noteSend.tipCodecKey: If you set this codec, that's means the note will be encrypted by this codec and receiver need to input this code to read the note

noteSend.tipEncrypt: This is HI-TOP-SECRET encrypt note, you must contact sender to obtain decrypt code to decipher the message
